conversations.body_text: Hi Magnus Als Tonnisen Larsen,  Please provide your order number so we can check the details. Also, after any mechanical or damper adjustments, please confirm whether you have used the Offset function to re-zero the initial signal. Additionally, please check whether the RJ11 4P4C connector on the brake pedal is loose. Have you secured the power cable with cable ties to prevent movement or poor contact?
